argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_relogcl | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( log ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_recnd | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( log ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_efexp | |- ( ( ( log ` A ) e. CC /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( exp ` ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( log ` A ) ) ^ N ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( exp ` ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) ) = ( ( exp ` ( log ` A ) ) ^ N ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_reeflog | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( exp ` ( log ` A ) ) = A ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( ( exp ` ( log ` A ) ) ^ N ) = ( A ^ N ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( exp ` ( log ` A ) ) ^ N ) = ( A ^ N ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( exp ` ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) ) = ( A ^ N ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( log ` ( exp ` ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) = ( log ` ( A ^ N ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_zre | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. RR ) |
| 11 |  | #P_remulcl | |- ( ( N e. RR /\ ( log ` A ) e. RR ) -> ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) e. RR ) |
| 12 | 10, 1, 11 | #P_syl2anr | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) e. RR ) |
| 13 |  | #P_relogef | |- ( ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) e. RR -> ( log ` ( exp ` ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) = ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( log ` ( exp ` ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) = ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 15 | 9, 14 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( log ` ( A ^ N ) ) = ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) ) |
